line_1: Sobs thro' the falling leaves and wither'd fern.
line_2: Seem o'er the ruins of the year to mourn;

line_1: Yonder rude circuit, where th' obtrusive fern
line_2: A few revolving halcyon months shall turn

line_1: To trace the walks obscur'd by matted fern,
line_2: But where now clamours the discordant hern!
